analyzed: ▁yas avat ī pa mukh a aṭṭh ā ras a bhikkh u nī sahass a apad āna
▁mān u s ika m atikkant ā

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ yasavatīpamukhāni khattiyakaññābhikkhuniyo aṭṭhārasasahassāni bhagavato sammukhā imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: ▁itth aṃ ▁sud aṃ ▁yas avat ī pa mukh āni ▁khattiya ka ññā bhikkh u ni yo ▁aṭṭhārasa sahassāni ▁bhagavato ▁sammukhā ▁imā ▁gāthā yo ▁abhāsitthāti
▁yas avat ī pa mukh a aṭṭh ā ras a bhikkh u nī sahass ā padān aṃ ▁paṭhamaṃ
